name: Inner Mongolia Duijiugou Coal Mine

The Inner Mongolia Duijiugou Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Ordos City, specifically in Longkou Town

operators: Inner Mongolia Jintai Duijiugou Coal Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Inner Mongolia Jintai Duijiugou Coal Co., Ltd. and owned by Xinjing Coal Mining Company.
